game.name: Anguna - Warriors of Virtue
game.desc:
Anguna is a short top-down fantasy action adventure game, reminiscent of the original Legend of Zelda. Featuring art by Chris Hildenbrand, it has 5 dungeons to explore.
Controls: A - Attack B - Secondary item X/Y - Switch secondary item (if you have more then one) Start - Pause, View subscreen Select - Save menu L/R - Switch between subscreen pages
